Message:
A few days passed,
and this time I was
the one that got sick.

Bedridden with a high fever,
I soon realized there were people
outside my house.

It was all the remaining survivors,
led by the priest.

“This all started because those
two gravekeepers handle the dead!
They’re the ones that spread
the disease!”

They sounded so angry,
like they were about to
break in any second.

But for some reason,
I wasn’t scared...

Because either way,
I’ll get to see Dad
and Laila soon.

In my feverish state,
I heard the sound of a dog
howling in the distance.

I knew whose
howl it was instantly.

Laila...?
Did you come to get me...?
